titleStmt.title: [Th]e young-man put to his dumps: being a gallant discourse on May-day last, between two witty lovers ... To a pleasant new tune, called, the The lovers delight, or, The Cambridge horn.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for VV. Thackeray, T. Passinger, and VV. VVhitwoods,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, with loss of text.
